LocalizationKeys.CONFIRM_RESET_SETTINGS: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
LocalizationKeys.ERROR_VALID_SAVE_PATH: Please select a valid save path
LocalizationKeys.HEADER_DESCRIPTION_BUG_REPORTING_THANKS: Thank you for reporting bugs, your input is crucial for making the project stronger (and more reliable)
LocalizationKeys.HEADER_DESCRIPTION_FANCY_SCREENSHOTS: Lets you take customised and quick screenshots of your game.
LocalizationKeys.HEADER_DESCRIPTION_FEEDBACK_THANKS: Thank you for giving feedback, it's invaluable in helping us improve and refine the project
LocalizationKeys.HEADER_DESCRIPTION_HELP: Access help resources and documentation for the Workflow Toolkit.
LocalizationKeys.HEADER_DESCRIPTION_NOTES: Lets you write quick and concise notes for those late-night coding sessions.
LocalizationKeys.HEADER_DESCRIPTION_POST_BUILD_ACTIONS: This tool helps automate post-build actions, such as copying files and zipping the build to make it easier to share/upload.
LocalizationKeys.HEADER_DESCRIPTION_SCRIPT_COUNTER: This tool counts various assets like scripts, audio files, models, and prefabs in a selected folder.
LocalizationKeys.HEADER_RESET_WARNING: Resets all settings to their default values. This action cannot be undone.
LocalizationKeys.LABEL_SETTING_RESET_SUCCESS: All settings have been reset to default values.
LocalizationKeys.LABEL_VISIT_BUG_REPORTING_FORM: Please visit the Bug Reporting Form here..
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_ADD_BONUS_FILES: Add extra files to your build.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_APPLY_BORDER: Adds a colored border to the screenshot.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_APPLY_RESOLUTION_MULTIPLIER: Increases the resolution of the screenshot.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_ATTACH_BUILD_PATH: Please attach your Builds Path and the ZIP File export path.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_BONUS_FILES_DESC: Add additional files to your build, such as soundtracks or art.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_BORDER_COLOR: Choose the color for the border.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_BORDER_THICKNESS: Adjust the thickness of the border.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_BUILD_PLAYER: Settings specifically for building the player.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_COPY_TO_CLIPBOARD: Copies the names of the counted files to the clipboard.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_COUNT_ASSETS: Counts the files in the selected directory with the specified file extension.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_CUSTOM_NAME: Specify custom prefix for screenshot names.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_DESTINATION_FOLDER: Specify the folder where files will be saved.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_DEVELOPMENT_STAGE: The current stage of the Development Cycle.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_DISPLAY_SCRIPT_NAMES: Display the names of counted scripts.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_DOCUMENTATION_VISIT_WEBSITE: For in-depth documentation, please visit our website or refer to the included PDF file.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_EDIT_NOTE_CONTENT: Edit the content of the note.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_EDIT_NOTE_NAME: Edit the name of the note.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_EXPORT_NOTES: Export all notes in the selected format.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_FILENAME_SEQUENCE: Define the sequence in which the ZIP file will be named.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_FILE_TYPE: Choose the format for exporting notes.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_GENERAL_DOCUMENTATION: Here are the general documentation details for the Workflow Toolkit.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_INCLUDE_HIDDEN_FILES: Include hidden files in the count.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_INCLUDE_TIMESTAMP: Include a timestamp in the ZIP file's name.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_JOIN_DISCORD: Join our Discord community for support and discussion.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_NAMING_SETTINGS: Customize the naming settings for your ZIP file.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_SELECT_DIRECTORY: Select a directory to search in.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_SELECT_EXPORT_PATH: Select a folder for exporting notes.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_SETTING_ALLOW_DEBUGGING: Enable debugging options for development builds.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_SETTING_BUILD_COMPRESSION_LEVEL: Set the compression level for the build.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_SETTING_BUILD_STRICT_MODE: Strict Build mode only allows builds with no errors.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_SHOW_FILE_SIZE: Display file sizes for counted scripts.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_TAKE_SCREENSHOT: Takes a screenshot of the current Game View.
LocalizationKeys.TOOLTIP_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT: Specify the format of the timestamp.
